section.title: standard journals posting of Post Standard Journal
section.para: To post a Standard Journal, select the "Post Standard Journal" option. The following screen will appear:
When posting a Standard Journal, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Specify the Standard Journal you want to post.
Indicates date when the Standard Journal should be posted to the General Ledger.
Select if you want to reverse the selected Standard Journal when it is posted.
